meanings.definition: A former monetary unit of Germany and the Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in Germany and the Netherlands used gulden to buy things.
meanings.sent2: The gulden was a type of money that was used long ago in Europe.
meanings.sent3: I found an old book that mentioned paying with gulden for a horse!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny gulden, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the gulden clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A gold coin formerly used in various European countries.
meanings.sent1: The shiny gulden was a prized possession in many European countries.
meanings.sent2: People would trade goods for a single gulden back in the day.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to find a magical gulden that granted wishes when tossed into a fountain.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as precious as a rare gulden coin.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the gulden, dazzling all who saw it.
